table.name: vtiger_expense
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_expense` ( `expenseid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `expense` VARCHAR(512) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`expenseid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_expensecf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_expensecf` ( `expenseid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`expenseid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
